text: Stable THP-1 cells expressing <extra_id_0> shRNA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1>

The lentiviral plasmid pLKO.1 expressing <extra_id_0> shRNA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> targeting human <extra_id_0> MyD88 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was purchased from Open Biosystems ( www.openbiosystems.com ) and was validated in our laboratory .

shRNA targeting human <extra_id_0> IRAK1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( forward primer 5'-CCGGAGCAGCTGTCCAGGTTTCGTCTCATAAAACCTGGACAGCTGCTCCTTTTTG-3 ' , reverse primer 5'-AATTCAAAAAGGAGCAGCTGTCCAGGTTTTATGAGACGAAACCTGGACAGCTGCT-3 ' mRNA ( <extra_id_0> IRAK1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA target sequence is underlined ) and human <extra_id_0> TRAF6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( forward primer 5'-CCGGAGAAACCTGTTGTGATTCGTCTCATAAATCACAACAGGTTTCTCCTTTTTG-3 ' , reverse primer 5'-AATTCAAAAAGGAGAAACCTGTTGTGATTTATGAGACGAATCACAACAGGTTTCT-3 ' ( <extra_id_0> TRAF6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA target sequence is underlined ) were designed in our laboratory and were cloned into the pLKO.1 plasmid .

Lentiviruses encoding shRNA sequences were generated by transfecting the packaging cell line HEK-293T with the shRNA-encoding pLKO.1 plasmids in combination with the packaging plasmid psPAX2 and the envelope plasmid pMD2.G using Effectene transfection reagent ( Qiagen , www.qiagen.com ) .
Supernatants were collected 48 hours post - transfection , clarified by centrifugation , and stored at - 80degreesC .

THP-1 cells were transduced with the lentiviral particles by culturing the cells with supernatants from the virus - producing cells in the presence of 8 microg / ml polybrene ( Millipore , www.millipore.com ) and spinoculation for two hours at 2000 RPM .
Successfully transduced cells were selected and expanded by treatment with 0.8 microg / ml puromycin .
